articles.title: LaLiga: We know Barcelona’s situation – Depay speaks on ‘regretting’ move to Camp Nou - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Barcelona forward, Memphis Depay, has insisted he has "no regrets" over his move to Camp Nou. Depay said he was delighted to join Barcelona despite the club's recent struggles both domestically and in Europe. The Netherlands international has had a mixed star…
articles.content:

articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: Watch the BepiColombo spacecraft zoom past Mercury in this new video - Space.com
articles.description: The European and Japanese BepiColombo spacecraft made the closest ever measurements of the magnetic field of Mercury above the planet's southern hemisphere as it zoomed past, snapping epic selfies along the way.

articles.title: EU regulator backs mRNA vaccine booster for people with weak immunity - AsiaOne
articles.description: The European Union's drugs regulator said on Monday (Oct 4) people with weakened immune systems should get a third dose of a Covid-19 vaccine from Pfizer-BioNTech or Moderna, but left it to member states to decide if the wider population should have a booster…
